That error will be one of the following types: Named Entities: An entity (names, places, locations, etc.) is changed to a different entity. Numerical Values: Numerical values (ordinals or cardinals), dates, and/or units are changed. Modifiers or Adjectives: The modifiers and adjectives pertaining to a noun are changed. Negation or Antonyms: Introduce or remove a negation or change comparatives to their antonyms. Facts: Trivial factual errors not pertaining to the above classes are introduced in the translations. Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Die Asian German Sports Exchange Programme ist eine nicht kommerzielle Nichtregierungsorganisation, die sich zur Aufgabe gemacht hat, den Friedensprozess, vor allem in Sri Lanka, nachhaltig durch das Motto „connecting sportspeople“ mitzugestalten.
Translation: The Asian German Sports Exchange Programme is an organisation that has set itself the task of sustainably shaping the peace process, especially in Sri Lanka, through the motto "connecting sportspeople".
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:
Thank you for asking me to identify the error in the translation from German to English. After carefully reviewing the given text, I have determined that the error is (B) Numerical Values.
In the original German text, the phrase "sich zur Aufgabe gemacht hat" can be translated to "set itself the task of" in English. However, in the translation, the phrase "sich zur Aufgabe gemacht hat" is changed to "set itself the task of sustainably shaping the peace process". This is an error because "sustainably shaping the peace process" is not a numerical value, and it does not make sense in this context.
Therefore, the answer is (B) Numerical Values.
